CustomField.formula: CC_CareOf__r.BillingStreet & IF(OR(ISBLANK(CC_CareOf__r.BillingStreet), ISBLANK(CC_CareOf__r.BillingCity)), ' ', ', ') & CC_CareOf__r.BillingCity & IF(OR(ISBLANK(CC_CareOf__r.BillingCity), ISBLANK(CC_CareOf__r.BillingState)), ' ', ', ') & CC_CareOf__r.BillingState &" "& CC_CareOf__r.BillingPostalCode
CustomField.label: CC Address
